templates.context: <character_1> is working in a busy restaurant. A customer gives their order to <character_1>. <character_1> grabs an opaque <container_1> and fills it with <state_1>. Then <character_1> grabs another opaque <container_2> and fills it with <state_2>.
templates.causal_event: A co-worker named <character_2> didn't hear the customer's request and swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> was attending to another task.

templates.context: <character_1> is a detective investigating a mysterious case. At the crime scene <character_1> finds a <state_1> and puts it in a <container_1>. Then <character_1> finds another piece of evidence, a <state_2> and puts it in a <container_2>.
templates.causal_event: A rookie detective named <character_2> accidentally swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> was interviewing a witness.

templates.context: <character_1> is a scientist conducting an important experiment in a laboratory. <character_1> needs to complete the experiment soon. <character_1> carefully measures and fills the <container_1> with <state_1>. Then <character_1> prepares a backup <container_2> and fills it with <state_2>.
templates.causal_event: A lab assistant named <character_2>, thinking the experiment requires a different substance, swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> is reviewing data.

templates.context: <character_1> is a gardener working in a beautiful botanical garden. <character_1> wants to plant some seeds in a new section of the garden. <character_1> gathers the seeds and fills the <container_1> with <state_1>. Then <character_1> prepares a backup <container_2> and fills it with <state_2>.
templates.causal_event: Another gardener named <character_2>, thinking the new section needs a different type of plant, swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> is watering other plants.

templates.context: <character_1> is a botanist conducting research in a dense rainforest. <character_1> wants to collect samples of a rare plant. <character_1> places the <state_1> samples in a <container_1>. Then <character_1> collects some <state_2> samples and places them in a <container_2>.
templates.causal_event: A fellow researcher named <character_2>, who is unaware of the importance of the samples, accidentally swaps the <state_event> samples in the <container_event> with the <state_swap> samples while <character_1> is setting up camp.

templates.context: <character_1> is an archaeologist at a dig site in Egypt. <character_1> wants to catalog a newly discovered artifact. <character_1> places the <state_1> artifact in a <container_1>. Then <character_1> places a more <state_2> artifact in a <container_2>.
templates.causal_event: A fellow archaeologist named <character_2>, who is unaware of the significance, accidentally swaps the <state_event> artifact in the <container_event> with the <state_swap> artifact while <character_1> is documenting the findings.

templates.context: <character_1> is a librarian organizing a special collection of books. <character_1> wants to ensure a rare book is properly stored. <character_1> places the <state_1> book in a <container_1>. Then <character_1> places a more <state_2> book in a <container_2>.
templates.causal_event: A library assistant named <character_2>, who is unaware of the importance, accidentally swaps the <state_event> book in the <container_event> with the <state_swap> book while <character_1> is arranging other shelves.

templates.context: <character_1> is a magician performing a grand illusion on stage. <character_1> wants to amaze the audience. For the trick, <character_1> puts a <state_1> in <container_1>. Then <character_1> puts a <state_2> in <container_2>.
templates.causal_event: An assistant named <character_2> swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> is distracted by the audience.

templates.context: <character_1> is baking a cake for a local charity event. <character_1> needs to mix the ingredients for the cake. <character_1> fills the <container_1> with <state_1>. Then <character_1> prepares a backup <container_2> and fills it with <state_2>.
templates.causal_event: A friend named <character_2>, who thinks the ingredients should be mixed differently, swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> is fetching more supplies.

templates.context: <character_1> is a jeweler creating a custom piece for a client. <character_1> selects a <state_1> and places it in a <container_1>. <character_1> then selects a <state_2> and places it in a <container_2> as a backup.
templates.causal_event: An apprentice named <character_2>, thinking the gemstones should be switched, swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with the <state_swap> while <character_1> was attending to another customer.
